meanings.definition: A sulfur-containing amino acid found in many animal tissues.
meanings.sent1: My doctor recommended a supplement with taurine to improve my energy levels.
meanings.sent2: Taurine is an important component of many energy drinks.
meanings.sent3: The taurine in my body must be working hard to keep me going!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to fitness was as strong as the sulfur bonds in taurine.
meanings.sent5: The role of taurine in muscle function is crucial for overall health.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a bull.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy wore a taurine hat to the rodeo.
meanings.sent2: The taurine characteristics of the bull were evident in its powerful stance.
meanings.sent3: The taurine nature of the bull made it a formidable opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as fierce as the taurine spirit of a bull.
meanings.sent5: The taurine strength of the bull was unmatched in the competition.
